42
Ontological Engineering
“Recommended and If-Applicable” Activities
• For each activity included 
in the NeOn Glossary of 
Activities, the table 
identifies which activities 
are required and which 
activities are optional 
(can be carried out or not, 
depending on the 
case)during the ontology 
network building process.
